fill_all_fields: Please fill in all fields before adding the customer.
customers_details: Select a client to see their details.
instructions_body: Fill in the fields and tap "Add" to create a new customer. Tap on a customer to view their full details.In the detail view, you can Update, Delete, or Close the customer panel. Your data is saved securely in a local database. Tap the 🏠 house icon to return to the main page.Use the ❓ help icon to toggle these instructions. You can also switch the language between English and Spanish from the top bar.
copy_or_blank_question: Do you want to copy the previous customer’s info or start with a blank form?
